tool.name: DCA Convert to MaxEnt input format
tool.command: #set $sif_name = "dca_miniapp_0_1_0.sif" #set $sif_image = "summit-singularity:0.1.0" #import re #from pathlib import Path mkdir -p portal/sofqomega0.bp portal/outputs && touch $normalization && #for $el in $input: #set $cleaned_name = re.sub('[\w]', '_', str($el.element_identifier)) #if Path($cleaned_name).suffix == '': #set $cleaned_name=$cleaned_name + '.'+$el.ext #end if cp -P '$el' 'portal/sofqomega0.bp/${cleaned_name}' && #end for module purge && module load DefApps && module load gcc/9.1.0 && source /gpfs/alpine/stf007/world-shared/containers/utils/requiredmpilibs.source && ( [ -e \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name ] || singularity pull --disable-cache --dir \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR} $sif_name oras://code.ornl.gov:4567/ndip/tool-sources/dca/dca_mini_apps/$sif_image ) && \${GALAXY_COMMAND_PREFIX} singularity exec --bind \$(pwd)/portal:/portal --pwd /portal/outputs \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name python3 -u /dca_mini_apps/analysis_to_maxent.py --file-analysis /portal/sofqomega0.bp && #set $storage_folder=os.path.join(str($experiment_name),str($normalization.hid)+"_"+str($normalization.history_id)+"analysis_to_maxent") STORAGE_FOLDER=\$PERSISTENT_STORAGE_DIR/$storage_folder && mkdir -p \$STORAGE_FOLDER && chmod g+rwX -R portal/outputs/* && mv portal/outputs/* \$STORAGE_FOLDER && ln -s \$STORAGE_FOLDER/* portal/outputs && mv portal/outputs/normalization_q.txt $normalization
tool.help: A tool to convert analysis results to MaxEnt format
